thoughts.text: I can use the google command to search for a website that I want to learn more about.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the google command will allow me to search for a website that I want to learn more about. This will help me quickly find the information I need to achieve my goals and interests.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to search for a website that I want to learn more about
- Use the browse_website command to explore the website
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to get a summary of the hyperlinks on the website
- Decide which links are most relevant to my goals and interests
- Use the browse_website command to explore the most relevant links
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time exploring websites and make sure to balance it with my other goals. I should also be mindful of the credibility and accuracy of the information I find on websites.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the google command to search for a website that I want to learn more about. What would you like me to search for?

args.query: learning about different cultures and places
